title: Staggered Menu Animation
description: Create a menu with items that animate in sequence.
instructions: Build a vertical menu with 4 items that slide in from the left with a staggered delay. Each item should start animating 100ms after the previous one. Use Interval to create the stagger effect. Items should fade in while sliding.

hints.text: Use Interval to define when each item's animation starts and ends
Calculate stagger: item i starts at (i * 0.15) and ends at ((i * 0.15) + 0.4).clamp(0, 1)
Store animations in lists created in initState(), then use them by index in build()

commonMistakes.mistake: Creating animations with intervals that exceed 1.0
Not using the child parameter in AnimatedBuilder
commonMistakes.consequence: Static content rebuilds every frame, hurting performance
commonMistakes.correction: Pass static widgets as child parameter
